summary: TAKATA RECALL.  RECEIVED RECALL NOTIFICATION LETTER DATED JULY, 2016.  HAVE RECEIVED NO FURTHER COMMUNICATION.  RATHER THAN DRIVE A TICKING TIME BOMB, I DECIDED TO SELL THE VEHICLE.  LOCAL FORD DEALER REFUSED TO QUOTE A PRICE OFFER FOR SAID VEHICLE.  CHEAPER FOR FORD MOTOR COMPANY TO PAY INJURY OR DEATH CLAIMS THAN DO THE RIGHT THING?
